name: 3D Sledding
description: Take the form of a penguin in this fun, fast-paced, 3d sledding game. 3D Sledding features a fully infinite map, beautiful 3d graphics, and amazing music! Github page here https://github.com/wi-photos/3D-Sledding. 3D SLEDDING DOES NOT WORK IN APPLE SAFARI.  PLEASE USE GOOGLE CHROME OR FIREFOX!
